document.full_text: thousands of syrians chanted slogans calling for greater freedom at independence day rallies on sunday, witnesses said, a day after president bashar al-assad promised to lift emergency law.
document.title: syria protesters call for freedom after assad pledge
lines_and_colors: thousands of syrians chanted slogans calling for greater freedom at independence day rallies on sunday, witnesses said, a day after president bashar al-assad promised to lift emergency law.
